About Me

As of June 2021, I'm a recent graduate of UC San Diego holding bachelor and master of science degrees in electrical engineering. During my time there I worked on a number of projects involving programming and the application of engineering techniques to real-world problems. I joined the Statistical Visual Computing Lab at UCSD for around two years, and prior to that I picked up some background in web development and software engineering at Enspirea, an HR-oriented web service company based in Evanston, IL. In addition to this I have worked on a number of personal projects out of curiosity or for fun.

I am interested in topics in computer vision, robotics, and machine learning. I am actively pursuing data scientist, software engineer, and Data/ML engineer roles, although I am open to anything that would fit my skillset. If you have any interest, feel free to reach out!
